0.1.name: wordpress/superfluid-donation-widget
0.1.description: This plugin allows users of superfluid:p2p (http://thesuperfluid.com) to embed a widget that lets other superfluid:p2p users donate virtual currency (with no commercial value) to them via their WordPress blog. You can customize the width and height of the widget as well as the default donation value. There is also an option to show the widget after every post.
